history.proof: intros x y e H. unfold AbsRing_ball in H. unfold AbsRing_ball. rewrite abs_minus. rewrite abs_minus in H. scongruence use: @abs_minus.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of opp_plus (opp (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of opp_plus (opp (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : AbsRing x, y : K e : R H : abs (minus x y) < e H0 : forall x0 y0 : ?G, opp (plus x0 y0) = plus (opp x0) (opp y0) H1 : forall x0 y0 : ?G0, opp (plus x0 y0) = plus (opp x0) (opp y0) Unable to unify "abs (minus x y) < e" with "abs (minus y x) < e".

original: intros x y e H. unfold AbsRing_ball in H. unfold AbsRing_ball. rewrite abs_minus. rewrite abs_minus in H. rewrite opp_plus. rewrite opp_plus in H. apply H.
